title: Analyzing Time Preferences of e-Learners and Developing Time Culture Adaptation Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Core Scientific Domain Knowledge and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Requires time management strategy development in short-term science education programs conducted in simulation/VR environments

learning_goals: Learners can diagnose their time preference type and develop time management strategies.
Learners can understand and apply time culture adaptation mechanisms in online learning environments.
Learners can analyze time pressure elements in simulation/VR-based learning and propose response strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
